The landing page will be final list
the user can see which movies have already been approved

from the landing page the users can go to which movies can be voted on
from that page one can either vote on the current canidates
or one can go to a movie list and submit a canidate for the 
canidate list.

users can also go to a movie page i.e. "shrek.html" to see 
details about the movies they are submitting as a canidate
